website_summaries.verdict: This is the latest version of the classic Jenga set from Hasbro. Simple game rules make Jenga an appealing choice for players of all ages, and the size is perfect for coffee, kitchen, or gaming tables.
pros: Contains 54 stackable wooden blocks and a stacking sleeve
cons: May arrive in a rectangular package, not the round version shown
Thin cardboard stacking guide, not sturdier plastic
Finish not as smooth as original Jenga

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: I’m honestly disappointed at the quality of the blocks as well as the reconstruction support. Unlike the traditional jenga blocks base of hard wood that can withstand the abuse of the game, the blocks in this set are very soft wood. Some of them aren’t even well finished (see pic)! Right away, some of the blocks are already warped and don’t sit flat. The cardboard they give you to help rebuild the tower is extremely flimsy - it’s just a single thin layer of card stock. I expected more for a classic game that families should be able enjoy for years, not months (based on how quickly and likely they’re to be warped, dinged and dented out of shape).
customer_reviews.author: DH

customer_reviews.title: Not what's pictured.
customer_reviews.text: The Jenga pictured is in a round thick box that you can use to store your Jenga blocks for many years. I paid higher price for this item specifically because they are showing the round storage container. I work with kids and I have one of these round Jenga boxes at work. They are great. I've had mine for 5 years and it still looks like new. The blocks that used to come in the round container were also higher quality. However, this one comes in a cheap very thin box and it's not going to work as a storage. I'm really upset that they are misrepresenting what they are selling.
customer_reviews.author: Misha's Review

customer_reviews.title: I did not get the round cylinder I paid for. Will be reporting.
customer_reviews.text: I did not get the round cylinder I paid for. If I could give them zero stars I would. If I had wanted the cardboard box I would have bought it. Do not purchase. Will be reporting this.
customer_reviews.author: Allison

customer_reviews.title: very disappointed. Not as it described
customer_reviews.text: very disappointed. Not as it described.got a totally different packaging. The reason I paid you more is for the packaging. I could have got this cheap vision for 10dollars instead of paying 20to you.
customer_reviews.author: ying sun

customer_reviews.title: Stacking is a pain
customer_reviews.text: We used to play this game all the time when I was younger and it came with a plastic rectangle case that you could put the blocks into stack them up perfectly and then pulled it off. This comes with a flimsy piece of cardboard and it’s very difficult to stack the pieces. And the tower is never straight. Also you can’t just throw all the blocks into the carrying case it comes with, the lid will not close.
customer_reviews.author: Erinm

customer_reviews.title: I got the tube version as pictured!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome Jenga edition. I definitely got the tube version, not sure why others didn’t but I’m glad I did!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Came as pictured in Cylinder Box!
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant to buy this Jenga game in Amazon because so many reviewers said the wrong version was sent to them, the original, cheap box. I received the game today and am so happy to report it came as pictured in the very durable orange cylinder container! This was a great price too! This version must be hard to find new because people on eBay are trying to sell used ones for double this price! Amazon came through again! Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Tracey W.

customer_reviews.title: who doesnt love jenga?
customer_reviews.text: who doesnt love jenga?! we used this as a guest book for our wedding, our guests wrote funny, sweet, kind, encouraging words or just signed their name on the blocks. now every time we play we get to reminisce back to our wedding.
customer_reviews.author: Dana Chestang

customer_reviews.title: Jenga in the Original Tube! (Read On)
customer_reviews.text: Jenga, IN THE Original, Tube Shaped, Heavy Duty, Last for Years, Box! I had the game already, but I bought it again, just to have the tube shaped box (giving it as a gift, to my Son, and his young family) Jenga is a great game, Box or no box, but the old school, Tube box is very cool (and pretty much indestucable) Note: Read through the reviews ... I saw quite a few, where, like me, they bought it mostly for the tube shaped box, but didn't get it. I rolled the dice, and got it :-) But, either way, it's a great game!
customer_reviews.author: Wayne Norton

customer_reviews.title: What's there to say?
customer_reviews.text: It's a bunch of wood blocks. Seriously, how can you screw that up? As for the game... It's Jenga. You either like it or not. ...or play it 'cause your 8 year old wants to play Monopoly and you don't feel like dedicating 12 hours to a board game so you negotiate her down to Jenga.
customer_reviews.author: Knives

customer_reviews.title: Came as pictured
customer_reviews.text: The game did come in the cylinder as pictured, so that's great... My only quarrel is the card stock thats supposed to help stack the blocks... Initially, I thought it was a part of the packaging because it has the instructions on it... BUT, it's the "sleeve "... I must say, it does A LITTLE but the trouble is getting the blocks off the bottom... All in all, I am happy with the purchase.. The game is fun and 5 year old loves it so I would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: nicole

customer_reviews.title: Not Bluetooth enabled!
customer_reviews.text: Simple. Basic. Wood. Fun. That's it, just an old-school distraction from the global connectedness of everyday life. Caution: use of this product may enable an increased sense of connection with those participating in the activity along with you. You may laugh together and then carry on a real, meaningful conversation as a result of your proximity and participation in the shared experience. Simple pleasures.
customer_reviews.author: John R.

customer_reviews.title: Received cylinder carrying case
customer_reviews.text: I took a shot in the dark and just hoped to get the cylinder and not the flimsy box everyone was saying they got. We were lucky and received the cylinder carrying case and are very happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Byron Vance

customer_reviews.title: Everyone loves Jenga!
customer_reviews.text: Our whole house loves Jenga. Bought two sets of these for my twins - used RIT dye to color one set green and the other set purple. Worked great, they don’t get their pieces mixed up, and the kids love them. Do wish the container was slightly bigger so you could just throw all the pieces in, rather than having to make the tower.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Raley

customer_reviews.title: Jenga is a good game for children
customer_reviews.text: This particular Jenga game was purchased in conjunction with Amazon's Toys for Tots Christmas program, which I was happy to participate in. I know the child who received this game will have hours of fun playing Jegna just as my son did when he was young. It is an excellent game which I would recommend to anyone as a perfect gift for just about any child.
customer_reviews.author: S. Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Very happy
customer_reviews.text: Love the container! Will come in handy for storage. (Ordered this particular one because of that actually!) This game is very popular for young and old. Little kids also like using these blocks to build with or to play along with their little farm animals/small cars.
customer_reviews.author: Jenl F.

customer_reviews.title: Great game but missing sturdy stacking sleeve
customer_reviews.text: Great game. Easy to put away and carry, BUT the “stacking sleeve” is a thin piece of cardboard that after a few uses tears. I remember the sturdy plastic sleeve years ago. Wondering how they can call the thin cardboard a stacking sleeve unless the manufacturer forgot to include the sturdier part. Good game. We’d just appreciate a sturdy sleeve for stacking.
customer_reviews.author: K T

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: Got it for when my son and 6 year old granddaughter come over. Sometimes you just need something that all ages can enjoy equally. I love the box it comes in and the carrying handles. I like Jenga specifically because it teaches 'cause and effect', critical thinking, and basic physics without the kids knowing that at all. They just know it's fun!
customer_reviews.author: Legs820

customer_reviews.title: Got exactly what I wanted!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for Christmas and it arrived on time with no damage to the container. We have exactly as the photo shows, the cylinder container is made of strong/sturdy cardboard. I don't foresee any issues for years to come.
customer_reviews.author: Mac9

customer_reviews.title: So much better with this container
customer_reviews.text: We had an older Jenga that was pretty beat up and putting it away was so annoying, especially after you get all the pieces in only to learn you put the clear plastic in wrong and your pieces are falling out. We play it more now because I'm not dreading putting it away.
customer_reviews.author: Elway737

customer_reviews.title: The Correct Game
customer_reviews.text: I always wanted a Jenga set since started to play in bars and games rooms but I wanted the “big jenga” which is so much better. Through research the “big” set of jenga was to expense. This game is so intense. I would really recommend this game to anymore. Also it did come in the package like the image description.
customer_reviews.author: DavinG

customer_reviews.title: FUN!!!
customer_reviews.text: Seriously one of the best game investments i have made. I love that the children in my family are able to play and I can also play alone, if i feel like it. Packing up the pieces in the cylindrical container is a bit of a pain but I enjoy the game anyway. The quality of the pieces are really nice as well.
customer_reviews.author: Karla

customer_reviews.title: I don't really have much to say about the game as it is easy to pick up and fun
customer_reviews.text: It's Jenga. I don't really have much to say about the game as it is easy to pick up and fun. The only reason I gave it a 4 star is because the cardboard container you use to make the tower is really flimsy and not particularly helpful for younger kids trying to play. Using a bit thicker material for that would have been nice.
customer_reviews.author: HBSTDM

customer_reviews.title: Classic Jenga
customer_reviews.text: I received the classic Jenga in the round tube. Just what I wanted for easy traveling, works great to play as normal. We use it on our DnD games for challenges and has been perfect. Tube is sturdy and keeps everything together, it comes with a piece to make sure it is flush when setting up the game. Would purchase again if needed!
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Ordered the version with the easy the put away container and instead got the classic ...
customer_reviews.text: Ordered the version with the easy the put away container and instead got the classic version only. So I charged extra and got the wrong product.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Reichel

customer_reviews.title: Round cylinder box holder and sturdy wood blocks like original.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered one May 2019. Have Prime so it came in two days. It is just like the original set we have. Blocks are the same size and weight, and wood not plastic. Box it came in is round cylinder and heavy duty, not a flimsy cardboard square box. It's just like the original Jenga we have that we got about 15 years ago. Great game. Lots of fun. Using it as a graduation gift = party guest will sign the blocks with their name and fun events or memories with the graduate. Great keepsake.
customer_reviews.author: cm

customer_reviews.title: Arrived as pictured
customer_reviews.text: Bought on November 5, 2018 and received it on November 7, 2018. I was fortunate to get the item as pictured. It arrived in the cylinder container and I had no issues with this purchase
customer_reviews.author: K. Chang

customer_reviews.title: Gift for boy of 11 years
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for my son. I like Hasbro toys. A toy as usual of excellent quality and my child is delighted. I also gave it to my friend who is 30 years old and he was happy too)
customer_reviews.author: Elka

customer_reviews.title: Lots of family fun!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this as a gift for our boys for Christmas, and this is their new favorite game! We like that the pieces can be stacked in this carrying case.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Love jenga. So we got this for our girls. Only complaint which I never thought about until we used it the second time is that its tricky for a kid to set it up without the clear sleeve that used to come in the old boxed jenga games.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Loads of fun !!!!
customer_reviews.text: Myself and my 10 yr old grandson played this Christmas day and had a blast, I had never played this before but one time and I was hooked, great game.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love this version of jenga! It has the carrying case along with paper that you use to restack the blocks which is an awesome feature. My wife and I play this and we all play it as a family. I would definitely recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: NA

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic game for kids of all ages.
customer_reviews.text: This is a fun game to play with grand kids of different ages because everyone can understand the concept and the best way to play from 5 year olds to adults. The grand kids have enjoyed it and so far no disappointments with the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: perfect gift, the original.
customer_reviews.text: nice packaging, classic game, with the quality wooden bricks you expect from the brand.
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: No splinters!
customer_reviews.text: Nice smooth edges and evenly made pieces. No splinters!!! Which could be very dangerous for kids. I’ve seen aftermarket versions of this with splinters. Took off one star because it doesn’t have enough pieces. Which it came with more it would be more exciting!
customer_reviews.author: Mr Josh

customer_reviews.title: False Advertising
customer_reviews.text: I had gone to numerous toy stores and finally found this version of Jenga on Amazon. I was so excited and expected to receive a convenient take-along, cylinder canister, as posted in this picture. What a disappointment!! Instead I received a different version in a FLIMSY box. Don't waste your time or money, you can purchase the same flimsy version at your local toy store for half the price.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs T

customer_reviews.title: Best Value and Quality Jenga
customer_reviews.text: Classic Jenga set and the orange case did come included. I was hesitant because I saw that some people received the set that comes in a cardboard box and I wanted the tube because the storage is more sturdy and Convenient for travel and it came just as described, I would highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Yesenia

customer_reviews.title: To small and light
customer_reviews.text: This set is small and so light that it is very difficult to get it to stay in place for the start up. I was just wanting an inexpensive set...AND THAT IS WHAT I GOT, a CHEAP SET....I would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Stella57

customer_reviews.title: Fun game!
customer_reviews.text: We love this game! Super fun lots of people can play together! Easy to play easy to clean up comes with bin for blocks with handle to carry with you! Blocks are very nice material not cheap at all!
customer_reviews.author: Missy!

customer_reviews.title: Carrying case is terrible
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to have this package of Jenga that seemed easy to carry, but it is round inside and the bricks go everywhere so you can't just slip out and set up. The holder has nothing to brace against. Poor design.
customer_reviews.author: Becky

customer_reviews.title: Daily fun easy clean up
customer_reviews.text: Love Jenga and was thrilled when we had to replace ours to find this one in this easy to put away container. My kid loves this game and now he doesn’t need help to clean it up
customer_reviews.author: K. H.

customer_reviews.title: Bad design of box, not able to put back
customer_reviews.text: The product itself is good. But after we played it and tried to put it back to the box, it is almost impossible, unless you stack each pic one by one. What a bad box design...
customer_reviews.author: Majag

customer_reviews.title: Classic game good container
customer_reviews.text: Keep the corner piece to set up for your next game. That is the only advantage of the paper box, this one is more sturdy than the other box which is why I like it better.
customer_reviews.author: Ker J

customer_reviews.title: Great high anxiety rush of heartache or joy.
customer_reviews.text: It's Jenna, same as it's ever been. It's a lot of fun. Great high anxiety rush of heartache or joy. Perfect for the whole family. This one come with a decent box and a card board thing to help stabilize your tower.
customer_reviews.author: KeelerWoman

customer_reviews.title: Somewhat fun, but cumbersome
customer_reviews.text: This is a classic game. But it seems to take more time building it up than it does tearing it down. Truly a game reserved for nights without power.
customer_reviews.author: W

customer_reviews.title: Great family fun
customer_reviews.text: We have had so much fun with this game. My four year old granddaughter is a real risk taker!! Those tiny arthritis free hands loved watching us lose!
customer_reviews.author: Peggy

customer_reviews.title: Package Came Open, Lid is Broken
customer_reviews.text: Really disappointed. My package came with the lid cut open, which makes the contents impossible to transport.
customer_reviews.author: Terence Lee

customer_reviews.title: Great for all ages
customer_reviews.text: Kids loved it. We played it Christmas day for hours. I have triplet grandchildren who just turned 5. I haven't found many games that can keep occupied like this game did.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn Schneller

customer_reviews.title: Great for Toddler as Well as Adults!
customer_reviews.text: Just like I remember playing. Real wood in a cardboard tube. My toddler loves this game, and it's one of the few games that even adults can enjoy with them. Candyland? Yawn. Connect 4? Snooze. But Jenga --- yeah, give me this one every single day of the week. Sometimes literally.
customer_reviews.author: M. JohnsonTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: beautiful basic wooden toy
customer_reviews.text: basic wooden toys are the best. We do everyting with these blocks except play jenga. We make castles, animals, and walls and tunnels for his train set. The best is the cylindrical container it comes in.
customer_reviews.author: John Ta

customer_reviews.title: It's Jenga, what did you expect to see in the reviews?
customer_reviews.text: It's Jenga. I usually leave detailed reviews on almost everything, but if you've played Jenga, you already know what you're purchasing. Just buy it if you like Jenga.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Great family game for little ones
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this game for my 5 year old daughter, and she loves it. Its a great game for beginners and will be very cherished in our house.
customer_reviews.author: E/L Edwards

customer_reviews.title: It's Jenga
customer_reviews.text: It's the real Jenga. It's a tub of smooth wood blocks that stack until they fall over. What more could you possibly need to know?
customer_reviews.author: S. Shanafelt

customer_reviews.title: Fun game
customer_reviews.text: This is a fun game for all ages. The pieces are well made and fit nicely back into the box.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle J.

customer_reviews.title: best version
customer_reviews.text: Classic. My son wanted this and he is nuts for this game. He's 9. Great buy and was looking for this one with the carrying case.
customer_reviews.author: T. Gaskin

customer_reviews.title: Great game! Sturdy and great quality
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a gift for my husband. Our family loves it and the wood blocks are durable. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Great fun!
customer_reviews.text: This classic Jenga game is always good for game night! My kids love this game and we have a lot of fun!
customer_reviews.author: Maria Elena

customer_reviews.title: It’s Jenga... Enough Said
customer_reviews.text: I used the Jenga blocks as a way to teach my students vocabulary words and/or start a group conversation. On one side I wrote the words/question, and on the flip side were the correct answers. They had ALOT of fun, and I got to be the “cool teacher”.
customer_reviews.author: Rubi Gutierrez

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Great classical game! Perfect for many ages my 2 and 6 year old love playing with it! Absolutely love that it came in the round sturdy container to store over many years.
customer_reviews.author: Mayra

customer_reviews.title: It's a Jenga
customer_reviews.text: Because of this, I'm definitely going to order the larger variant. After all these years, I finally caved in and purchased my own. To date, it still continues to provide family fun. Amazon delivered it undamaged. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: JUSTCHILL3N

customer_reviews.title: Kids loved this
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a gift for the grandkids and they enjoyed it right away. It was nicely packaged and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn S Setter

customer_reviews.title: Crushed case
customer_reviews.text: Sad that the jug came crushed already. It's supposed to be a christmas gift. I don't wanna pick it up by the strap as I am afraid to break it but ur supposed to be able to store and carry it easily. Otherwise it's Jenga and a fun game
customer_reviews.author: Brenda

customer_reviews.title: Great product with Great Quality!
customer_reviews.text: The pieces are of high quality with strong carrying case for easy storage. This has strong case with plenty of extra space so that you can just dump the blocks after your game!
customer_reviews.author: AB

customer_reviews.title: Great game that I play with my wife.
customer_reviews.text: We have a lot of fun with it even though she usually beats me. The only problem is the cheap cardboard thing used to set up the tower. The old plastic one was much better.
customer_reviews.author: Paul F

customer_reviews.title: Great packaging
customer_reviews.text: This is a great game- but what really sets it apart is the study case it comes in.
customer_reviews.author: pj

customer_reviews.title: Jenga, someone is going to cry!
customer_reviews.text: I got the nice tube package as pictured, sorry for the folks so irate about not getting it. The classic family game. Unchanged, see the true personalities of your nearest and dearest reveal themselves.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Box arrived broken.
customer_reviews.text: The box came broken at the top. Game works fine but cannot travel with it without pieces spilling out.
customer_reviews.author: Jason W Hemsley

customer_reviews.title: Thrilling and fun to watch and play
customer_reviews.text: We played this game 20 years ago and loved it. Now I’m playing it with my kids and they love it too. The storage box is handy, but missing a plastic piece to align the blocks when you build the tower before starting the game.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Nasser

customer_reviews.title: The original Jenga game!
customer_reviews.text: This is the real deal with hardwood blocks and the sturdy tube with a carry handle. I think this will make a great Christmas gift.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen D. Seidel

customer_reviews.title: Fun game
customer_reviews.text: Who doesn’t love Jenga...grandsons played right away...no having to read instructions!
customer_reviews.author: G. Greene

customer_reviews.title: Family fun night!
customer_reviews.text: This went over better than I expected. The kids love playing it, and they actually went viral on IG and FB with their creative methods of playing. Everyone should have jenga in the closet for those nights you want a game night, rainy/snowy days, forced quarantine, etc...
customer_reviews.author: Jamison Fox

customer_reviews.title: Jenga was a hit!
customer_reviews.text: We got the Jenga as a Christmas present for an older friend and his family. We really enjoyed playing it over the holidays. Turned out to be a great gift.
customer_reviews.author: DA

customer_reviews.title: Nice & small
customer_reviews.text: We love the small jenga blocks. The kids love building with them. The wood is smooth & well made.They are easy to carry around
customer_reviews.author: Nosh

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Great gift for any age. Good fun game to play as a group or even a couple peopke
customer_reviews.author: Bobby Hirons

customer_reviews.title: Gift
customer_reviews.text: Bought as gift for granddaughter for Christmas, will write a review after Christmas
customer_reviews.author: tcarneal

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Super fun to play this with my grandkids. Fast shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Hillary Kerns

customer_reviews.title: As pictured
customer_reviews.text: As shown in picture (round packaging), came in perfect conditions and great price!
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer

customer_reviews.title: Great gift! Kids love it.
customer_reviews.text: Great gift for a 7 year old. Lots of fun. Older kids enjoy it as well.
customer_reviews.author: Mommy NYC

customer_reviews.title: Not big enough
customer_reviews.text: The tube is not big enough to just toss the blocks in after finished playing. If you still have to stack the tower before putting it in, then there is really no point in buying it over the regular square box version for much cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: Wing Shea

customer_reviews.title: Great fun
customer_reviews.text: This is great fun for young and not so young. Easy to manage, keep well in the container provided.
customer_reviews.author: Finoy Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Total all-time fun game
customer_reviews.text: Such a fun gift Lots of laughs shared playing with the family
customer_reviews.author: susan nunnally

customer_reviews.title: Awesome purchase
customer_reviews.text: Very fun and good quality. My 5 year old even loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Se Webb

customer_reviews.title: very funny
customer_reviews.text: I love it. I bought it with the Black Friday discount and I'm really happy with it. I gave it to my nephew as Christmas gift and it's so much fun. Nice package, you can bring it with you wherever you go easily
customer_reviews.author: Andrea P.

customer_reviews.title: A Lot Of Fun
customer_reviews.text: We love playing this game! Great for family get together or just two people!
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Family fun
customer_reviews.text: This game has become a staple in my house! My 12 year old down to my 3 year old all love it and have a blast!
customer_reviews.author: Andrea D. Sloan

customer_reviews.title: Jenga! Jenga! Jenga!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a replacement gift for grandson and he loves it..
customer_reviews.author: Tria

customer_reviews.title: so much fun
customer_reviews.text: very easy to learn and great for friends and family this game is so fun to play i highly recommend everyone to ply it at least once.
customer_reviews.author: Grey

customer_reviews.title: SOLID AND CHALLENGING
customer_reviews.text: Came in the round carton, as seen, which is great for keeping pieces together. Bought for grandsons to play something besides video games and talk on the phone. Wish they didn't have so much of the electronic stuff. The pieces are solid and this should last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Mississippi Girl

customer_reviews.title: People may not realize how much they will love it- but they will love it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this after seeing it in a toy store and being reminded of my childhood- I had forgotten all about Jenga. I mean I still play games- but Xbox, Kinect etc. I stopped playing games like this a very long time ago, however what a brilliant idea it was to get this!!! I invited all my friends over saying lets play jenga- they laughed thinking I was kidding but then everyone got into the mood- I promise it is an amazing party game- could even say it creates a party
customer_reviews.author: Miss Pixie

customer_reviews.title: Missing pieces
customer_reviews.text: It supposed to come with 54 pieces but only had 50, plus the stacking sleeve is missing. Looking at other pictures of satisfied customers, it’s seems as if this game was used. Didn’t pay full price for a used game that is missing pieces. Very disappointing!
customer_reviews.author: Navy Guy

customer_reviews.title: FUN! Very well made!
customer_reviews.text: Grandchildren cannot stop playing it! It is simple and fun!
customer_reviews.author: Randy P

customer_reviews.title: qood quality pieces
customer_reviews.text: very nice game for any age group 3yo and up; very easy to learn; teaches patience and fine motor skills
customer_reviews.author: Ramkumar

customer_reviews.title: fun game
customer_reviews.text: fun to play, easy to understand. nephews love it, especially when I lose
customer_reviews.author: Lorraine C.

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive investment that would make anyone happy.
customer_reviews.text: My 7 year old and 4 year enjoyed playing with this wooden block set. I did not have to worry about anyone getting hurt. It also thought my 4 year how to create a pattern. This block set had my boys creating strategic plans on how to win. They were not bored, great and inexpensive way to teach them as well as peace and quiet. Mission accomplished.
customer_reviews.author: saudi nawrangilall

customer_reviews.title: Great game!
customer_reviews.text: Great condition. Game is easy to play and easy to learn.
customer_reviews.author: Anahi

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Made a great gift. Easy to wrap and the cylinder design makes clean up a breeze. Great game for the whole family.

product_meta.title: Jenga Game Wooden Blocks Stacking Tumbling Tower Kids Game Ages 6 and Up (Amazon Exclusive)
product_meta.description:
Want a game experience that combines friends, skill, suspense, laughter, and maybe a little luck? Get the Classic Jenga game! Carefully pull a wood block out of the tower and place it on top. It's easy at first, but as more blocks get pulled, the tower starts to get unsteady. Players will be on the edge of their seats just trying to keep the tower from tumbling. The Classic Jenga game is quick to set up, and is an easy game to play just about anytime, almost anywhere. It's a great game for parties, family game night, and the rules are simple enough for the whole family to play. For kids ages 6 and up. Jenga is a registered trademark of Pokonobe Associates. Hasbro Gaming and all related terms are trademarks of Hasbro.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
This is the blockbuster of all stacking games! The original wood block game. The rules are simple enough for the whole family to play: just stack the blocks into a tower without letting it fall! But it's fun for all ages, too, as some blocks from the bottom of the tower are pulled to make it taller! Who will make the tower fall' For any number of players. Contents: 54 genuine hardwood blocks and instructions.
feature_bullets: Pull out a block, place it on top, but don't let the tower fall; This fun, challenging game is a great game for families and kids 6 and up
THE ORIGINAL WOOD BLOCK GAME: The Jenga game is the original wood block game that families have loved for generations
GAME FOR 1 OR MORE PLAYERS: No friends around No problem. Play Jenga solo; Practice stacking skills, building the tower and trying not to let it come tumbling down
TUBE SHAPED BOX: Includes 54 wood blocks and easy-to-use stacking sleeve to help players build the tower; Comes in an easy "put away" tube-shaped package with a handle for carrying and easy clean up
GREAT PARTY GAME: Liven up a party by bringing out the Jenga game; This classic block stacking game is simple, easy to learn, and makes a great birthday or holiday gift for adults and kids
